original_title: Professionals Trade Union Collective to call off strike 8am tomorrow
original_body_lines: The Professionals Trade Union Collective has decided to call off the 24-hour general strike at 8.00 am tomorrow.
Accordingly, the Government Medical Officers' Association (GMOA) and the Ceylon Bank Employees' Union said today that their trade union action will be called off at 8 a.m. tomorrow (16).
